TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendContextMenu

Docs.summary: 啟用嵌入式管理單元，以將項目加入至現有的捷徑功能表。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用 IExtendContextMenu 介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddMenuItems (Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject piDataObject, Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IContextMenuCallback piCallback, ref int pInsertionAllowed);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddMenuItems(class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject piDataObject, class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IContextMenuCallback piCallback, int32& pInsertionAllowed) cil managed
Public Sub AddMenuItems (piDataObject As IDataObject, piCallback As IContextMenuCallback, ByRef pInsertionAllowed As Integer)
public: void AddMenuItems(Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IDataObject ^ piDataObject, Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IContextMenuCallback ^ piCallback, int % pInsertionAllowed);

Docs.param: 功能表資料物件上 的指標，AddMenuItems 會將該功能表的項目新增到捷徑功能表。
可以將項目加入至捷徑功能表之 的指標。
可以使用的 MMC 定義功能表項目插入點。
Docs.summary: 啟用嵌入式管理單元，以將項目加入至現有的捷徑功能表。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計<xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IExtendContextMenu>介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Command (int lCommandID, Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject piDataObject);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Command(int32 lCommandID, class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject piDataObject) cil managed
Public Sub Command (lCommandID As Integer, piDataObject As IDataObject)
public: void Command(int lCommandID, Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IDataObject ^ piDataObject);
abstract member Command : int * Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject -> unit

Docs.param: 功能表項目的命令識別項 (Command Identifier)。
要顯示捷徑功能表物件上之 的指標。
Docs.summary: 當選取其中一個您所新增的捷徑功能表項目時，Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 會呼叫 Command 方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計<xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IExtendContextMenu>介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。
